Psychologically abused?: Was not allowed to see his father.  He did not have a rolemodel.  He grew to hate his mother because of this.
Diagnosis: He was said to be obsessive-compulsive
Left at scene, no attempt to hide: The bodies were left near the scene in rural wooded areas.Although the bodies were hidden
Left at scene, hidden: The bodies were hidden near the scene in rural wooded areas.The method of dumping suggested that the killer was actingout of panic rather than experience.
Moved, no attempt to hide: The bodies were found a few miles from where the abductiontook place
Cut-op and disposed of: The bodies were cut with knife wounds
